GENERAL.name: INFO_GENERAL
GENERAL.description: The configuration line, php.ini location, build date, Web Server, System and more.

CONFIGURATION.name: INFO_CONFIGURATION
CONFIGURATION.description: Current Local and Master values for PHP directives. See also ini_get().

MODULES.name: INFO_MODULES
MODULES.description: Loaded modules and their respective settings.

ENVIRONMENT.name: INFO_ENVIRONMENT
ENVIRONMENT.description: Environment Variable information that's also available in $_ENV.

VARIABLES.name: INFO_VARIABLES
VARIABLES.description: Shows all predefined variables from EGPCS (Environment, GET, POST, Cookie, Server).

LICENSE.name: INFO_LICENSE
LICENSE.description: PHP License information. See also the Â» license faq.

ALL.name: INFO_ALL
ALL.description: Shows all of the above. This is the default value.
